# DTD Node Kind Constants

**API Collection**

Constants that specify the kind and subkind of DTD declaration represented by an `NSXMLDTDNode` object. You set the DTD-node kind using the doc:nsxmldtdnode/1806486-setdtdkind method.

## Constants

- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.general**: Identifies a general entity declaration.
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.parsed**: Identifies a parsed entity declaration.
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.unparsed**: Identifies an unparsed entity declaration.
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.parameter**: Identifies a parameter entity declaration.
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.predefined**: Identifies a predefined entity declaration.
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.cdataAttribute**: Identifies an attribute-list declaration with a `CDATA` (character data) value type.
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.idAttribute**: Identifies an attribute-list declaration with an `ID` value type (per-document unique element name).
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.idRefAttribute**: Identifies an attribute-list declaration with an `IDREF` value type (refers to element `ID` type).
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.idRefsAttribute**: Identifies an attribute-list declaration with an `IDREFS` value type (refers to multiple elements of `ID` type).
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.entityAttribute**: Identifies an attribute-list declaration with an `ENTITY` value type (refers to unparsed entity declared in document).
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.entitiesAttribute**: Identifies an attribute-list declaration with an `ENTITIES` value type (refers to multiple unparsed entities declared elsewhere in document).
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.nmTokenAttribute**: Identifies an attribute-list declaration with a `NMTOKEN` value type (name token).
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.nmTokensAttribute**: Identifies an attribute-list declaration with a `NMTOKENS` value type (multiple name tokens)
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.enumerationAttribute**: Identifies an attribute-list declaration with an enumeration value type (list of all possible values).
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.notationAttribute**: Identifies an attribute-list declaration with a `NOTATION` value type (name of declared notation).
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.undefinedDeclaration**: Identifies an undefined element declaration.
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.emptyDeclaration**: Identifies a declaration (`EMPTY`) of an empty element.
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.anyDeclaration**: Identifies an `ANY` element declaration.
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.mixedDeclaration**: Identifies a declaration of an element with mixed content (`(#PCDATA | child)`).
- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind.elementDeclaration**: Identifies a declaration of an element with child elements.

## Constants

- **XMLDTDNode.DTDKind**: The type defined for the constants that specify the kind and subkind of DTD declaration represented by an `NSXMLDTDNode` object. You set the DTD-node kind using the doc:nsxmldtdnode/1806486-setdtdkind method.
